documentation.author: Steve Wade
documentation.purpose: This rule is designed to transmit an email message to several interested people when an inpatient, observation or emergency patient is charted with a diagnosis of Sepsis or another diagnosis with sepsis in it's name. The email is sent with the patient name and the patient location.

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_DIAGNOSIS_E
templateDefinitions.definition: OPT_DIAGNOSIS with OPT_QUALIFIER, OPT_CONFIRMATION, OPT_CLASSIFICATION, OPT_CLINICAL_SERVICE, OPT_DX_TYPE, OPT_SEVERITY_CLASS, OPT_SEVERITY, OPT_RANK, OPT_CERTAINTY were ACTION_TYPE. Optionally narrow diagnosis matching by limiting cross-mapping to OPT_CROSS_VOCABS vocabularies OPT_PERSON_ACTIVITY concepts on patient’s profile and/or OPT_VOCAB_HIERARCHY hierarchy or ignoring concepts altogether OPT_IGNORE_CONCEPTS.

column.value: Including cross map patient activity data
Excluding cross map patient activity data

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_DEBUGEKM_E
templateDefinitions.description: Turn debug messaging on or off

statements.statement:
select debug_status = if (d.seq = 1) "On for subsequent Evoke Templates" elseif (d.seq = 2) "Off for subsequent Evoke Templates" elseif (d.seq = 3) "On for all Logic Templates" elseif (d.seq = 4) "On for all Action Templates" elseif (d.seq = 5) "On for all Logic and Action Templates" elseif (d.seq = 6) "To FullAudit for this module only" elseif (d.seq = 7) "Additional EKSDATA logging" ENDIF, _hidden = if (d.seq = 1) 1 elseif (d.seq=2) 0 elseif (d.seq=3) 2 elseif (d.seq=4) 3 elseif (d.seq=5) 4 elseif (d.seq=6) 5 elseif (d.seq=7) 6 endif
FROM (DUMMYT D WITH SEQ = VALUE(7))

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ENCOUNTER_DETAIL_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the patient's ENC_DETAIL QUAL DETAIL_VALUE for the same encounter as OPT_LINK

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ENCOUNTER_LOC_DETAIL_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the patient's ENC_DETAIL that QUAL in DETAIL_VALUE for the same encounter as OPT_LINK

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_DIAGNOSIS_INCOMING_L
templateDefinitions.definition: OPT_DIAGNOSIS with OPT_QUALIFIER, OPT_CONFIRMATION, OPT_CLASSIFICATION, OPT_CLINICAL_SERVICE, OPT_DX_TYPE, OPT_SEVERITY_CLASS, OPT_SEVERITY, OPT_RANK, OPT_CERTAINTY were ACTION_TYPE. Optionally narrow diagnosis matching by limiting cross-mapping to OPT_CROSS_VOCABS vocabularies OPT_PERSON_ACTIVITY concepts on patient’s profile and/or OPT_VOCAB_HIERARCHY hierarchy or ignoring concepts altogether OPT_IGNORE_CONCEPTS. Find all matches OPT_MATCH_ALL.

column.value: Including cross map patient activity data
Excluding cross map patient activity data

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_MESSENGER_A
templateDefinitions.definition: Send message to RECIPIENT with subject OPT_SUBJECT and message MSG with a OPT_PRIORITY priority.
templateDefinitions.description: Send message to printer, email, alphapager

value.value: INPATIENT w/ SEPSIS DX – ATTENTION PLEASE
@PATIENT:1 with MRN @MEDICALNUMBER:1 has a sepsis related diagnosis. @PATIENT:1 is located at, @PTFACENC:1 @PTNURSENC:1
